ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMEDCT codes for regional anesthesia (spinal/epidural/peripheral nerve blocks) used during total hip and total knee replacements.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with regional anesthesia for total hip and total knee replacements. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes representing spinal/epidural anesthesia and peripheral nerve blocks used for total hip and total knee replacements.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes general, local, monitored anesthesia care (MAC), IV Conscious sedation.)
